p: To test for the presence of the agent of herpesviral hematopoietic necrosis (HVHN), cyprinid herpes virus-2 (CyHV-2)), a generic PCR and nested-PCR (CyHV-pol assay) targeting the herpesvirus DNA polymerase gene was conducted, as described before [ 11], using the extracted viral nucleocapsid of cells inoculated with two pool of samples.
